text: Kathleen Anne Brien (born 8 May 1989), better known as Katy B, is an English singer and songwriter. She released her first album On a Mission on 1 April 2011. It got good reviews from music critics. It was nominated for the 2011 Mercury Prize. Katy was born in Peckham, London. She went to the BRIT School. Her album, Little Red was released in February 2014. She released the second single from it, "5 AM", on 4 November 2013. It reached number fourteen in the UK Singles Chart. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:English singer- songwriters Category:Living people Category:Singers from London Category:People from Peckham
title: Katy B
